title: S with jhin but no M6 shard?
body:
I got an S- with jhin, got an m6 shard, next game i get an S and no shard...??? 

https://imgur.com/a/7hdxQ

replies.body: Hmmmm looks like it might have just taken a bit for that second mastery token to show up, but I do see where you finally got the second one and was able to upgrade your Jhin mastery!
